snippet: This is for sure: Brandon Phillips has swagger. This is also for sure: fans around the country will not see it on display for the remainder of October .
lead_paragraph: This is for sure: Brandon Phillips has swagger. This is also for sure: fans around the country will not see it on display for the remainder of October .

headline.main: Flash of Reds’ Phillips Loses Spotlight Again
headline.print_headline: Flash of Reds’ Phillips Loses Spotlight Again
